question: Indian origin Wavel Ramkalawan has been elected as the President of which country?
explanation:
Indian Origin Wavel Ramkalawan, has been recently elected as the President of Seychelles.
He belongs to the opposition party and it is the first time since 1977 that a person from opposition is assuming the office of President. Ramkalawan, a former Anglican Priest, defeated incumbent Danny Faure after three decades of unsuccessful runs for the Presidency.
